title: Game randomly crashing during game
body: I've died three times during my game and have randomly crashed to desktop without any warning. Please help.

replies.body: Wow that's a frustrating circumstance, but I'm happy to hear things turned out alright.  Did you get any error messages at all?  Give me some more details on what you mean by crash, and I'll be happy to help!

Thanks for the info!  It's odd that there's no error message but it sounds like something might be failing to render the game and closing it out.  I suggest going over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot, which will go over factors like bad drivers or game files.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps!
